IMPORTANT NOTE: Game will be sunset as of 31st of January!
Until then, we have reduced the prices of all in-game items, so you can enjoy some extra holiday fun!

BATTLE SOLO OR VERSUS FRIENDS
Experience real-time, free-movement duels against players from all over the world! Invite your friends to join a custom match and battle them across a variety of arenas or battle solo against AI opponents in order to improve your skills.

CROSS PLATFORM MULTIPLAYER
Meet opponents from all over the world playing on both PC and Mobile VR. 

POWER-UPS
Discover fun power-ups and special weapons that add a creative twist to your attacks and that constantly change the battle rules.

COLLECT HEROES AND WEAPONS
Unlock a variety of charming characters and weapons with different attributes and play styles.

BECOME THE STAR PLAYER
Climb the global and weekly leaderboards to prove youâ€™re the best imaginary Hero!

changelog.change_log:
Repaired a malfunctioning teleporter on the day-time island map.
Re-implemented anti-aliasing.

New power-up: Mothr Spider from Apex Construct
Crash fixes on the Hush-Hush Homestead map.
Brightened night-themed maps to reduce visibility issues.
Bomber droid is now able to use teleporters.
Turret now fires more accurately.
Improved prevention of 6-dof players walking through walls.
Improved hit detection on Banana Beamer
Xp slider in post match result in now more accurate.
Improvements to gamepad settings.

Re-implemented anti-aliasing.
Fixed a bug where items could display the wrong price in the shop.

Prevents 6-DOF users to walk through collisions.
Added random level option in level select.
Added level select when playing against bots.
Improved projectile hit detection.
Fixed AI pathfinding issues.
Improved gamepad support.
Other various fixes.

- 2 New Levels
- 1 New Character (2 Skins)
- Improved Gamepad support

- 1 new character, 2 skins!
- 2 new maps!
- 4 new weapons skins
- Soft currency earned from matches
- Soft currency rewards after each level up
- See all your player stats
- Medals now visible in matchmaking VS screen
- See what devices/platforms people are playing on
- See top 7 ranking even if ranked below top 7 (not just number one)
- Level not capped at 20 anymore

[Content/Fixes]
- Weapon balancing for all weapons
- Penalty for suicide
- Added language change support

[Bugs]
- Bot does not keep powerup after death
- Beamer is not usable on match end
- Fixed jittering issues when losing headset tracking
- Rocket Chicken improvements
- Banana Beamer is more reliable
- Fix for players spawning on top of each other
- Tweaks on AI difficulty
- Performance fixes
- Improved projectile collisions
- A win always results in at least one ELO point
